short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extends AntMaps with additional features. 
 Added link to AntWiki to species list

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Elevate your AntMaps.org journey with AntMaps Plus. This extension effortlessly bridges AntMaps and AntWiki, appending "AntWiki" links to species listings for rapid access to detailed AntWiki pages and adding a hover image from inaturalist.

Streamline your species research and enjoy a more cohesive experience on AntMaps.org, all without compromising your privacy or personal data.
